name: Widget
shortdesc: Generic term for an object in a dialog column or dialog row, including dialog controls such as radio button groups, checkboxes, editboxes, dropdowns, and comboboxes; static text objects; enabling groups; border panels; and nested dialog columns and dialog rows. For information, see dialog column, dialog row, static text, border panel, enabling group, radiobutton group, checkbox control, angle editbox, angle combobox, integer editbox, integer combobox, measurement editbox, measurement combobox, percent editbox, percent combobox, real editbox, real combobox, and text editbox.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Widget.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Widget &#40;a DialogColumn, DialogRow, EnablingGroup, BorderPanel or RadiobuttonGroup).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Widget within its containing object.

property.name: minWidth
property.shortdesc: The width of the control. For an editbox or combobox, specifies the minimum width of the box.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Widget.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
